inclusion.criterion: Healthy women between 8 weeks and 50 weeks after delivery.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women who can read, write and understand English.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to perform strength training or moderate-intensity exercise.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Athletes/well-trained mothers (i.e. mothers undergoing regular strength training).
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Smokers and women who are planning to become pregnant over the subsequent year.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: A 5 months old male with undescended testis, but mother is healthy and can read/write English.
